segments.text: I notice the girl nearby, her hand raised in anticipation, so eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something sweet and innocent about their little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But do they realize how risky this is? The stool could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of worry for them both.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she leans forward shows she really believes they’ll succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout out a warning, but I’m frozen in my spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if something goes wrong? This scene is delightful but dangerously chaotic!
segments.speaker: PAR
